about_the_game:
The Deep Rock Galactic Original Soundtrack Volume I + II is a total of one hundred fifty minutes of gut-punching space dwarf synth goodness! It contains 36 full tracks, composed, mixed, and arranged entirely by our inhouse sound-wizards, Sophus and Troels, here at Ghost Ship Games.

Volume I: 101 minutes of awesome deep space synth tracks in MP3 and FLAC!
Volume II: 51 minutes of awesome deep space synth tracks in MP3 and FLAC!

You can read the in-depth story about the soundtrack in this blog post

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: You are probably fine here :-)
  • Graphics: Just close your eyes...
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SOUNDBLASTER

Recommended:
